forum.content: My thirty-six-year-old boyfriend told me he's madly in love with a teenager on Beetalk, he said that they dated only for sex in the beginning. Anyway, the perfect girl was just too tender to resist. Then they were in the romantic relationship. I know I should have left but I didn't. Anyway, few months later, my boyfriend came to me because that perfect girl turned out to be a lier. Many people warned me that he’ll find another young girl for another novel start. I don't need judgment, thanks. What should I do to identify whether a man is treating you with all his heart or not⁇How to give out trust again⁇
forum.title: 一Life is a mess.
